body:
Heyo,
My name is CubeRoot, or Mike if you don't like maths, and I've only recently started playing Avicus. I had joined once or twice on my old account, but never really played. I'm from the Overcast Network, and saw a few fights between our two servers, got interested and logged on.
I'm a map-maker, and I currently have my first Avicus map in-dev after being asked by ParaSpider to make one.
I recently started shopping things again, and started doing GFX for people, such as YouTube banners and thumbnails. Here are a few examples of my work.



I also like photography. Here's some Macros I took, hope you like em.


I am a type-one diabetic (not to be confused with type-two diabetes, which is caused by overeating or other lifestyle issues). I have overcome depression and anxiety.
I like public speaking, gaming, pretending to be a moron in-game, GFX/photoshop and photography.
I joined the servers on this account while Overcast has been down, and it's a nice change. It was quite a thrill to be reported by so many people I rekt in one game that a mod came on. :D
I am editing a montage of my gameplay from today right now, might link it when I'm done.
I hope to see you guys online sometime!

title: Heyo, I'm The CubeRoot :3

replies.body: Hey can you make me a youtube banner? I'm sorry I don't have a link but  my name will come up its EvanDoesGaming ,and if you subscribe you would be my 100 sub :)

replies.body:
Of course :P Though English is my strong point...
Thanks for the welcome everyone :3 Please don't ask for GFX here though. I'm doing everyone who asked still, but add me on Skype at CubeRoot_ if you want me to send you them. Thanks.

replies.body: Welcome to Aviworld! Sorry if those so called "wars" with OCN bothered you. Just ignore them. I promise I'll try my best to help you have a great time and I'm sure the Avipeeps agree. If you are unsulted for being from OCN, ignore them. You seem like a great guy, Cube. :)

replies.body: Heh, nah :P The only thing that I found I didn't like with Avicus was the site; looked a lot like OCN's, but it's changed now, and in my opinion, it looks so much sexier than OCN's.
